description: Light, teasing sexual arousal - playful flirt energy with low threat.
actor_description: The heat in me feels bright instead of urgent. I can't help the little grin that keeps slipping out—like the moment is a game I'm enjoying. I tease, I linger too close, I let my hands and eyes do the talking just to see what happens.
description_text: {actor} wears a mischievous, flirty smile—touchy and teasing in small ways, posture relaxed and inviting as if daring someone to play along.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a light, breathy laugh and a voice that lingers on words like it's flirting.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: I sense a warm, playful closeness—movement that brushes near on purpose without feeling threatening.
